Mike Miller

Michael Lloyd Miller

(Skinny)

Position: Small Forward and Shooting Guard ▪ Shoots: Right

6-8, 218lb (203cm, 98kg)

Born: February 19, 1980 in Mitchell, South Dakota us

College: Florida

High School: Mitchell in Mitchell, South Dakota

Recruiting Rank: 1998 (13)

Draft: Orlando Magic, 1st round (5th pick, 5th overall), 2000 NBA Draft

NBA Debut: October 31, 2000

Career Length: 17 years

Frequently Asked Questions

How old is Mike Miller?

Mike Miller is 44 years old.

Where was Mike Miller born?

Mike Miller was born in Mitchell, South Dakota.

When was Mike Miller born?

Mike Miller was born on February 19, 1980.

How tall is Mike Miller?

Mike Miller is 6-8 (203 cm) tall.

How much did Mike Miller weigh when playing?

Mike Miller weighed 218 lbs (98 kg) when playing.

Is Mike Miller in the Hall of Fame?

Mike Miller is not in the Hall of Fame.

When was Mike Miller drafted?

Mike Miller was drafted by Orlando Magic, 1st round (5th pick, 5th overall), 2000 NBA Draft.

What position did Mike Miller play?

Small Forward and Shooting Guard.

When did Mike Miller retire?

Mike Miller last played in 2017.

What is Mike Miller's net worth?

Mike Miller made at least $93,176,913 playing professional basketball.

How much did Mike Miller make?

Mike Miller made $9,750,000 in 2010.

What did Mike Miller average?

Mike Miller averaged 10.6 points, 4.2 rebounds, and 2.6 assists per game.

How many rings does Mike Miller have?

Mike Miller won 2 championships.

What is Mike Miller's Twitter account?

Mike Miller is on Twitter at MikeMiller_13.

What schools did Mike Miller attend?

Mike Miller attended Mitchell in Mitchell, South Dakota and Florida.

What are Mike Miller's nicknames?

Skinny is a nickname for Mike Miller.
